1.0.name: wordpress/postmark
1.0.description:
Replaces Wordpress' wp_mail() function to send mail through Postmark's API

Note: you need a Postmark account set up to use this plugin.

Limitations:

  • Email attachements are not supported
  • Additional headers sent to the wp_mail function are not supported
  • Only text based emails are supported
